I think the reason I liked 4 better though was because 4's Dante wasn't assholish like 3's Dante and was just a laidback cool dude bro. 

PLUS FUCK YEAH NERO IS AWESOME!

Devil May Cry 3 did have Vergil who I do enjoy. But now it looks like I get to Enjoy him in DMC 4 too now so HELL YEAH!

"@Patologička":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/548c5ae06368723396e10100#post_548c5ae06368723396e10100
Just so you know, there are a few 'unofficial rules' of the forums that I totally didn't make up.

1. Every conversation can - and will - come back to Revengeance.
2. If Rule 1 is defied, then it will come back to Yuugi from Touhou instead.
3. Trashboat will post whatever the hell he wants.
4. Number1Pegasus fights for his friends
5. I tip the scales around here.
6. If you go near the Fetishes thread, be ready to see some _weird shit_.[/bq]

Ya'll give me the time and I could write up rules for EVERYONE on this damn thread with bios.
I know enough that I probably could.
